description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924; head and shoulders of young man looking at viewer with chin raised slightly; behind him is a green band of water with white crested waves
inscription: LL in purple conté pastel pencil, below image: Probedruck I. | LL of sheet, in purple conté pastel pencil: Frau Dr. Rauert herzlich | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Dr. Rauert. | LRC of sheet, in pencil: E.163-II | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1871 | URC of sheet in pencil, on verso: Dr. Rauert - Hamburg
portfolio: From Plate 9 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in purple conté pastel pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23
title: Man at the Sea (Self-Portrait), Plate 9 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
